## Individual Quiz

:::columns
:::{.column width="57%"}
#### Before the quiz begins

1. 🧹 Clear your desk of everything except a pen/pencil and your cheat sheet.
2. 🧢 Remove hats, hoods, and sunglasses.
2. 📱 All electronic devices (laptop, phone, airbuds, smart watch) should be remain in your bag for the entire class period.
3. Spread out as much as possible: 1 student to a triangle desk, 2 to a tall desk.
4. When you get a quiz, cover it with your cheat sheet and do not begin.
:::
:::{.column width="43%"}
#### During the quiz

1. 👀 Keep your eyes on your own quiz.
2. If you need to use the bathroom, bring phone and quiz to the front of the class.
3. ⌛If you finish early, please raise your hand and we will pick it up.
4. ❗You must stop writing when time is called or risk a 0.

Good luck! 🍀

:::
:::

## Group Quiz

:::columns
:::{.column width="57%"}
#### Before the quiz begins

1. Form groups of 2-3 people.
2. 🧹 Everything except a pen/pencil and your cheat sheet must remain off your desk.
3. 📱 All electronic devices (laptop, phone, airbuds, smart watch) should be remain in your bag for the entire class period.
4. When you get a group quiz, write all group members names on it but do not begin.
:::
:::{.column width="43%"}
#### During the quiz

1. 🗣️Discuss each of the problems and decide as a group which answer is best.
2. ⌛If you finish early, please raise your hand and we will pick it up.
2. ❗You must stop writing when time is called or risk a 0.

Good luck! 🍀

:::
:::
